item.title: Xbox One S - The ultimate games and entertainment system
item.description:
Xbox One S - The ultimate games and entertainment system

Play the greatest games lineup on the highly-anticipated Xbox One S, the first and only console with 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray, 4K video streaming, and High Dynamic Range support for games and video. Available August 2nd.

item.title: This Week on Xbox: July 29, 2016
item.description:
This Week on Xbox: July 29, 2016

This week includes an in-depth look at Halo Wars 2, the Xbox Summer Spotlight, the launch of We Happy Few and much more.

item.title: Xbox Summer Update
item.description:
Xbox Summer Update

Larry Hryb talks with Mike Ybarra from the Xbox engineering team about the new Xbox update. New features include Cortana, support for Background Music, updates to the Store and more!

item.title: Xbox One S Deconstructed!
item.description:
Xbox One S Deconstructed!

Watch the Game Boy get deconstructed! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3VInLLR5fzM Xbox One S: http://amzn.to/1tsxvyo What happens when you teardown the Microsoft Xbox One S? item.title: Introducing Ana | Overwatch
item.description:
Introducing Ana | Overwatch

Meet Ana-a battle-scarred agent who would do anything to protect the people closest to her.

item.title: Mafia III - Cassandra - The Voodoo Queen
item.description:
Mafia III - Cassandra - The Voodoo Queen

A first-hand witness to the mob's ruthless trafficking rackets, she's vowed to take them down no matter the cost. She's as ruthless as she is mysterious. God help anyone that gets in her way.

item.title: Forza Motorsport 6 Turn 10 Summer Car Pack
item.description:
Forza Motorsport 6 Turn 10 Summer Car Pack

The Turn 10 Summer Car Pack for Forza Motorsport 6 has arrived! Whether you're looking to recreate the legends of motorsport's past, or you want to create yo...

item.title: #KILLALLZOMBIES - Announcement Trailer
item.description:
#KILLALLZOMBIES - Announcement Trailer

In the distant future, #KILLALLZOMBIES thrusts civilians into a sport of survival, where a ravenous zombie population is unleashed in the name of sports entertainment. With the potential of a collective horde of over 1,000 zombies, spectators vote upon how many and what kind of zombies or obstacles they want to uncage to make survival easier or harder for you to accomplish.

item.title: Welcome to the Overwatch Summer Games
item.description:
Welcome to the Overwatch Summer Games

The Overwatch Summer Games have begun! Celebrate the spirit of competition from now through August 22. Collect over 100 unique Loot Box items-including skins, highlight intros, emotes, sprays, and more-or grab your friends and hit the soccer field for a fierce game of Lúcioball!

item.title: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III - 7/28 Black Market Trailer
item.description:
Call of Duty®: Black Ops III - 7/28 Black Market Trailer

Call of Duty®: Black Ops III's biggest Black Market update yet has arrived with new Epic Taunts, personalization items, and weapons, including the Peacekeeper MK2 assault rifle, R70 Ajax 3D ammo-printing LMG, DBSR-50 double barrel sniper rifle, and more.
